game.name: Beyond Two Souls
game.shortDescription:
A unique psychological action thriller delivered by A-list Hollywood performances of Elliot PAGE, Willem DAFOE, Beyond: Two Souls™ takes you on a thrilling journey across the globe as you play out the remarkable life of Jodie Holmes. 
Born with a connection to a mysterious entity with incredible powers, Jodie is different. 
Your actions will determine Jodie's fate as she faces extraordinary challenges, danger, and heart-wrenching loss on a journey to discover the truth of who she is.
